synopsis: Johnson’s mundane life as a salary-man comes to an end when he uncovers that he’s actually a notorious space pirate named Cobra.
A brutal reptilian slave trader seeks to get a hold on the Psycho-Gun’s schematics and only Cobra is capable of taking him down.
Cobra meets a beautiful bounty-hunter by the name of Jane Royal. Jane is one of three sisters whose tattoos are said to be part of a treasure map.
Cobra infiltrates a prison in order to rescue Jane's sister, Katherine. But while getting into prison is simple enough, getting out is where the fun begins.
As Cobra and Katherine are on their way back to the Turtle, they come under fire from a mysterious sniper and are forced to seek cover.
Cobra discovers the source of the mind control that had afflicted Jane, someone working for Crystal Bowie who goes by the name Tavege.
Not wanting to provoke Crystal Bowie any further, Tavege takes the destruction of Cobra into his own hands.
Crystal Bowie has been throwing everything he has at Cobra, but in the end it'll come down to a one-on-one showdown.
Cobra sets off to Planet Lelouge in search of the last of Captain Nelson's daughters. The rumor is that she's a part of the all-female gang, the Snow Gorillas.
Cobra and Dominique escape from Planet Lelouge and attempt to uncover the location of Captain Nelson's treasure.
On a harsh, desert planet, the Ultimate Weapon that's said to be Captain Nelson's lost treasure lies hidden. Cobra desperately tries to make it to the weapon before the Snow Gorilla Leader Sandra.
Sandra has the Ultimate Weapon and doesn't hesitate to unleash its full power on Cobra. He'll need to use his wits if he's to have any hope of defeating her.
In pursuit of stolen gold, Cobra and Lady travel to Las Vegas Station and confront Hammerbolt Joe, a notorious Pirate Guild leader.

title.jp: The Great King of Bad Galtan

synopsis: Cobra comes face-to-face with the all-powerful Galtan, a giant with magical powers who treats humans like playthings.

title.jp: The Friend of The Dragon`s Crystal!

synopsis: Cobra returns to Planet Wing to share a drink with his old friend Vega only to discover that his friend is in desperate need of help.
As a favor to Dominique, Cobra agrees to pose as a Rug Ball player so that he can uncover the inner dealings of an illicit drug trafficking ring.
Mr. Rand proposes an exhibition game between Team 1 players and a team of Cobra's own picks. Cobra decides to enlist the misfits from the Z team
Cobra's team squares off against the players from Team 1. In the first half of the rug ball game, Team 1 plays dirtier than Cobra anticipated.

title.jp: Will The Victory Home-Run Be Ours!?

synopsis: Cobra purposefully suffers an injury so that he can sneak into Mr. Rand's security room during the game, but this leaves his team to play on without him.

title.jp: Mortal Fight! The Terrible Sand Sea

synopsis: Cobra helps a group of refugees escape a seemingly invincible, mysterious, armored foe across a vast desert.

title.jp: The Two Kings of The Sword

synopsis: Cobra and Lady are captured and held aboard the Swordians' desert crawler, The Sand Rook. Cobra soon finds that the Swordians' previous king still lives.
Cobra decides to visit Jingoro, the man who created The Turtle. Upon arriving at Jingoro's house, he finds it ransacked and Jingoro's daughter kidnapped.

title.jp: Tomb at the Bottom of the Ocean

synopsis: Cobra and Dominique are on vacation together when they see a massive cruise ship destroyed. Before they can investigate, they're attacked and Dominique is kidnapped.

title.jp: Would You Care for a Robot?

synopsis: Cobra and Lady notice a cute robot for sale as they pass through a bazaar. After purchasing the robot, they start to see a number of disasters befall the local populace.
After Cobra steals a large quantity of diamonds from The Pirate Guild, they're out for revenge. They kidnap Lady and demand that Cobra exchange the diamonds for her.
Cobra steals a case full of rubies from a war-torn planet. Before he can manage to escape the planet, he finds himself caught up in the conflict.
Dominique calls Cobra with concerns about The Pirate Guild watching her. Cobra investigates and finds that a man named Salamander is at the center of their organization.
In order to take down Salamander, Cobra decides to enlist some old friends to help. Unfortunately for Cobra, one of them will need to be sprung from prison.

title.jp: The North Pole Man - Warm blooded.

synopsis: Cobra, Doug, and Pumpkin head to ice-covered planet to get the last member of their crew. Upon arriving, they find that The Pirate Guild was already lying in wait.
Cobra infiltrates a Pirate Guild gathering in an attempt to assassinate Salamander. This proves to be a difficult task as he finds a powerful energy barrier protecting Salamander.
Salamander, thought to be dead, is alive and well! As he enacts his plan to take over the universe, only Cobra remains to stop him.
